Tracking content usage will be incredibly beneficial for marketers. I've often heard marketers and content editors express concern about whether a piece of content has been used or can be safely deleted. Now, you can precisely see where items in the content hub are used, enabling you to make informed decisions about deletion. No more worrying! 👏
While we wait for the native e-commerce implementation, the Shopify integration offers a ready-to-use, fast-to-market online store solution for your Xperience by Kentico web channels. I have already tested it and wrote about my experience in [this blog post](https://www.goldfinch.me/blog/integrating-headless-shopify-with-xperience-by-kentico).
